terms.name: IoT Device
terms.description: Physical device embedded with sensors, actuators, and connectivity to collect and exchange data

terms.name: Sensor
terms.description: Device that detects and measures physical properties or changes in the environment

terms.name: Actuator
terms.description: Device that is responsible for moving or controlling a mechanism or system

terms.name: Edge Computing
terms.description: Processing data closer to the source (edge) rather than relying solely on centralized cloud servers

terms.name: MQTT (Message Queuing Telemetry Transport)
terms.description: A lightweight and efficient messaging protocol for communication between devices in IoT

terms.name: IoT Gateway
terms.description: Device that connects IoT devices to the internet and facilitates communication between them

terms.name: IoT Platform
terms.description: Software that facilitates the management, communication, and data analysis of IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Security
terms.description: Measures and practices implemented to secure IoT devices and networks from cyber threats

terms.name: RFID (Radio-Frequency Identification)
terms.description: Technology that uses radio waves to identify and track objects with RFID tags

terms.name: Smart Home
terms.description: Residential space equipped with IoT devices for automation, security, and energy efficiency

terms.name: IoT Protocol
terms.description: Set of rules governing the communication between IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Architecture
terms.description: Structural design of interconnected IoT components and their interactions

terms.name: IoT Analytics
terms.description: The process of examining data generated by IoT devices to extract meaningful insights

terms.name: Digital Twin
terms.description: Virtual representation of a physical object or system, providing real-time insights and monitoring

terms.name: IoT Connectivity
terms.description: The methods and technologies enabling communication between IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Cloud
terms.description: Cloud-based services and platforms used to store, analyze, and manage IoT data

terms.name: IoT Firmware
terms.description: Software embedded in IoT devices to control their functionality and behavior

terms.name: IoT Standards
terms.description: Agreed-upon specifications ensuring interoperability and compatibility among IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Prototyping
terms.description: The process of creating a preliminary version of an IoT solution for testing and validation

terms.name: IoT Power Management
terms.description: Strategies and technologies for optimizing the power consumption of IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Data Privacy
terms.description: Measures to protect the confidentiality and privacy of data collected by IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Machine Learning
terms.description: The integration of machine learning algorithms with IoT systems for intelligent decision-making

terms.name: IoT Health Monitoring
terms.description: Use of IoT devices to monitor and track health-related metrics for individuals or patients

terms.name: IoT Supply Chain
terms.description: Application of IoT technologies to improve visibility and efficiency in supply chain management

terms.name: IoT Industrial Internet
terms.description: Application of IoT in industrial settings to enhance automation, efficiency, and safety

terms.name: IoT Biometrics
terms.description: Use of biometric data in IoT systems for authentication and identification purposes

terms.name: IoT Human-Machine Interface
terms.description: Methods and technologies enabling interaction between humans and IoT devices

terms.name: IoT Predictive Maintenance
terms.description: Use of data and analytics to predict when equipment or machinery requires maintenance in IoT applications

terms.name: IoT Edge Analytics
terms.description: Performing data analysis on IoT devices at the edge of the network, reducing latency and bandwidth usage
